title: T200 NY Giants SGC AUT...Matty & Jim Thorpe rookie...Now sold!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: T200 NY Giants SGC AUT...Matty & Jim Thorpe rookie...Now sold!
posts.post_content:
Has wrinkling that is typically seen with this issue but is not a bad example that is free from other significant wear.  One of the very few baseball cards to feature Jim Thorpe as well as a few HOFers - Matty, Marquard and McGraw.

Asking $110 delivered.  Thanks in advance!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=196219&d=1435890814[/IMG]

Brian, 
I Sent You an email...

Thanks Denny, Jeff and everyone else that expressed interest in the card. I've been away all day and finally just now got to respond to your messages.  

Per request, here is a scan of the back.  Thanks much!

Brian

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=196342&d=1435985396[/IMG]
